doc.course_introduction: Covering the tools and techniques of both multivariate and geographical analysis, this course provides hands-on experience visualizing data that represents multiple variables. This course will use statistical techniques and software to develop and analyze geographical knowledge.
doc.course_chapter: Getting Started//Multivariate Analysis//Supervised Learning//Unsupervised Learning//Part 1: Geographical Analysis//Part 2: Geographical Analysis
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Introduction to Multivariate Analysis'], ['Introduction to Scatterplots', 'Mosaic Plots', 'Pixel Based Displays', 'Parallel Coordinate Plots', 'Text Visualization', 'Jupyter Notebook Demonstration: Multivariate Analysis'], ['Supervised Learning', 'Supervised Learning: Nearest Neighbor', 'Supervised Learning: Regression', 'Supervised Learning: Evaluation'], ['Introduction to Unsupervised Learning', 'Unsupervised Learning: Evaluation', 'Jupyter Notebook Demonstration: Machine Learning'], ['Introduction to Geographical Analysis and Visualization', 'Thematic Maps', 'Coordinate System', 'Map Projections', 'Map Elements and Typography', 'Introduction to Choropleth Maps and Color Schemes', 'Data Classifications', 'Spatial Statistics'], ['Spatial Autocorrelation', 'Spatial Scan Statistics', 'Geovisual Analytics Systems', 'Jupyter Notebook Demonstration: Geographic Data']]
